title: How to Smoke a Ham in a Smoker

steps.headline: Season it well with salt, pepper and oil.
Get a fire and a grill rack.
Cut the ham in half lengthwise.
Cover the ham with aluminium foil.
Place the grill on top of the fire.
Put any flavour enhancing extras on it.
Cook it for at least 10 minutes on each side.
Let it cool a little bit and than you can eat it.

text: Get or buy your ham.  Season it well with salt, pepper and oil.  Get a fire and a grill rack.  Start the fire.  Cut the ham in half lengthwise.  Cover the ham with aluminium foil.  Place the grill on top of the fire.  Put any flavour enhancing extras on it.  Cook it for at least 10 minutes on each side.  Let it cool a little bit and than you can eat it.  Finished.
